title: Equality of Skins Upon the Rift
body: So, I just want to say its been a long time since a lot of champions have gotten skins, and i get that riot is trying their best to release more skins for the champions but can we not keep getting skin repeats for champions?I know its based off of popularity but you've got Over a Hundred Champions. Yasuo doesn't need 2 new skins before Kled even gets one more. Heck... Lux got 3 New Skins before Shyvana even got one. While Yes im holding out for the year 2024, being the year of the dragon for her to finally get one, Id rather not wait four more years for one. Hell Give Ivern a skin. I dont even play the Freaky bastard, but he needs one... All Im asking is maybe One new skin, for every champion, once every two years. I dont think its that hard, seeing as you release new skins with every patch....

replies.body: Riot is a business. They produce what they think will sell. It has nothing to do with "equality," especially regarding cosmetic items for video game characters.
it's never about how hard it is to make a skin for a champion it's about how much money they can make. But I agree.
